Commands.Documentation: Opens the shop with the given name (string)
Adds a card to the active deck by its english name (string)
starts the fighting Scene in Unity
Activates the given GameObject by its name (string)
Returns the current Time as (int) 0:morning 1:late morning 2:afternoon 3:evening 4:night
Sets the world to the given time in (int) 0:morning 1:late morning 2:afternoon 3:evening 4:night
Returns a bool | False: The action the player is about to perform would take too much time.| True: The player has enough time to perform an action
